problem_summary_simple: Find the first index where a given pattern matches in an infinite stream of bits.
problem_summary_technical: Employs KMP's prefix function to efficiently match a pattern against an unbounded stream of bits, reading one bit at a time.
key_insights: KMP's prefix function (LPS array) is essential for optimizing pattern matching.
The solution iteratively reads from the stream, updating the match state.
The constraint on pattern length (10^4) is handled efficiently by KMP.
